input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
No description available.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in 30L Smooth Twill'
  - Name='Club Monaco Travel Suit Trouser'
  - Name='Club Monaco Men's Relaxed Fit Mid Rise Casual Mini Chino Shorts'
  - Name='Club Monaco Pleated Wool Trouser'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Classic Fit Easy Khaki Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Relaxed Canvas Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Linen Trouser'
  - Name='Everlane Men's The Athletic Fit Air Chino Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Slim-Tapered Cropped Twill Trousers'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Wovenair Trousers'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Transit Chino'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's 250 Skinny-Fit Stretch Chino Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Straight Fit Performance Chino'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's The Performance Chino Slim Fit Pant'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 34L Smooth Twill Trousers'
  - Name='Club Monaco Hybrid Texture Elasticated Trouser'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 32L Smooth Twill Trousers'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 32L Wovenair Trousers'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Morse Pants'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's The Democratic Foundation Pant'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Original Chinos'
  - Name='Men's Dockers Signature Iron Free Stain Defender Relaxed-Fit Khaki Pleated Pants'
  - Name='Men's Dockers Signature Go Straight Khaki Pants'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Classic Fit Signature Khaki Lux Cotton Stretch Pants Pleated'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in 30L Smooth Twill
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are classic fit trousers likely made from twill fabric, similar silhouette and intended use as chinos or casual trousers.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Travel Suit Trouser
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Suit trousers tend to be dressier and more formal than chinos; fewer similarities in construction and purpose though same lower body garment category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Men's Relaxed Fit Mid Rise Casual Mini Chino Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts version of chinos, related product but significantly different silhouette and function due to being shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Pleated Wool Trouser
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wool material and pleated styling diverge greatly from typical chinos; more formal and different fabric construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Classic Fit Easy Khaki Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit khaki chinos are highly comparable in fit and style; a very relevant competitor to the Democratic Chino.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Relaxed Canvas Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Canvas pants with relaxed fit are similar casual garment type but likely heavier fabric and different silhouette than chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Linen Trouser
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Linen trousers are lightweight alternatives but differ in fabric and sometimes construction from cotton chinos; still somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's The Athletic Fit Air Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chino pants with athletic fit share core product type; differences in fit style but still very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Slim-Tapered Cropped Twill Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Twill trousers with slim tapered and cropped styling differ in silhouette but are similar product types; reasonably relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Wovenair Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit woven trousers likely similar in use and construction as chinos, differing slightly in fabric treatment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Transit Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly a chino pant, likely very similar product type and silhouette to the Democratic Chino.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's 250 Skinny-Fit Stretch Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Skinny-fit chinos are close in category and construction, differing in fit style but relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Straight Fit Performance Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance chinos with straight fit are highly comparable in construction, intended use, and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic designation 'pants' is too broad to guarantee relevancy, but as a menâ€™s pant it may share some features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's The Performance Chino Slim Fit Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit performance chino is very close in both product category and style, almost direct match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 34L Smooth Twill Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic-fit twill trousers are similar in function and silhouette to chinos, very relevant competitor.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Hybrid Texture Elasticated Trouser
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Hybrid texture and elasticated features suggest more casual or performance focus differing from classic chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 32L Smooth Twill Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same reasoning as other Lululemon ABC Classic-Fit twill trousers; similar style and fabric to chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 32L Wovenair Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic-fit woven trousers are comparable to chinos in purpose and silhouette, slight fabric variation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Morse Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand with different pant style; possible similar quality and construction but different model from Democratic Chino.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's The Democratic Foundation Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same core line as Democratic Chino; likely very similar in construction and silhouette, less than identical product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Original Chinos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Original chinos from a known brand; very close product category and style to Democratic Chino.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Dockers Signature Iron Free Stain Defender Relaxed-Fit Khaki Pleated Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Relaxed fit with pleats deviates from typical chino silhouette though same general category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Dockers Signature Go Straight Khaki Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight fit khaki pants from Dockers are close to classic chinos, quite relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Classic Fit Signature Khaki Lux Cotton Stretch Pants Pleated
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit and cotton stretch indicate similarity but pleats and potential formality reduce relevancy slightly.
